import React from 'react' export default function Herosection() { return ( <>

E-Hatch

Truly StartUp !!
Turn Ideas Into Reality

Get Started

About E-Hatch

Why E-Hatch?

A country’s economic profile is highly linked with its entrepreneurial activity. With our honorable prime minister’s initiative of Make in India which is based on our four pillars and aimed at improving and boosting entrepreneurial growth in India, we bring to you our combined effort to contribute in this sector with E-hatchery, a one- stop platform connecting bright entrepreneurs, Mentors and Investors across the country



A boom in startups in India is highly visible Last year, India was standing proudly in third place after the USA and China in terms of the number of unicorns. but yet a lot of innovative ideas go unnoticed or crumble due to lack of funds or proper attention, or a lack of a proper platform where young minds can pitch their ideas, through e-hatch we make sure that none of the ideas go unnoticed and everyone gets an equal opportunity to succeed.

Entrepreneur

E-hatch platform allows startups to network, pitch their ideas, get direction from the best mentors, access resources and guidance from verified mentors, and raise funds from our community investors.

Mentors

Mentor innovative minds and ensure learning and sharing of expertise. This platform matches mentors and mentees based on their skills, expertise, experience, and values Allows mentors to provide guidance to young minds

Investors

An example of where you can put an image of a project, or anything else, along with a description.

Viewers

Another example of a project with its respective description. These sections work well responsively as well, try this theme on a small screen!







) }
